word:
The work in Nashville is important. If the workers labor earnestly and judiciously, there will be conversions to the truth in the schools of learning that have been established in Nashville for the colored people. Let every worker be sure that he has on the gospel shoes, that his feet are shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace.--Ms 128, 1902. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. August 6, 1987. Entire Manuscript.
